questions.ques: What is the purpose of a database in web development?
What is the difference between GET and POST methods in HTTP?
options: GET is used for sending data to the server, while POST is used for retrieving data from the server
GET is used for retrieving data from the server, while POST is used for sending data to the server
GET and POST are interchangeable and can be used interchangeably

questions.ques: What is the difference between SQL and NoSQL databases?
options: SQL databases are relational, while NoSQL databases are non-relational
SQL databases are non-relational, while NoSQL databases are relational
SQL and NoSQL databases are the same thing
